boardgame.name: Darkest Night (First edition)
boardgame.description: Darkest Night, by designer Jeremy Lennert, is a fully-cooperative board game for one to four players (up to six with variants), set in a kingdom broken under a necromancer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s shadow. Each player takes on the role of one of the kingdom_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s last heroes (nine playable characters), each with a unique set of special abilities, just as they hatch a plan to save the realm._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Searching the kingdom provides new powers and equipment to strengthen you and your party, as well as the keys that can unlock the holy relics and defeat the necromancer. You can acquire many powerful abilities_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;unique to each hero_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;that can help to fight the undead, elude the necromancer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s forces, accelerate your searches for items and artifacts, and more. The knight is a brave and powerful warrior; the prince can rally and inspire the people; the scholar excels at locating and restoring the treasures of the past._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But ravenous undead roam the realm, and as the necromancer continues to build his power base, he blights the land and his army steadily grows. As the game wears on, the necromancer becomes more and more powerful, creating blights more quickly and effectively. If an area becomes too blighted, it gets overrun_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;and the monastery receives the spillover. And if the monastery is ever overrun, the necromancer wins and the kingdom is swallowed in darkness!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Before the monastery falls, it's up to you and your party to defeat the necromancer in one of two ways: If you can gather three holy relics and bring them all back to the monastery, you can perform a powerful ritual to break the necromancer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s power and scour the land of the undead. Alternatively, you can try to defeat the necromancer in direct combat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;but be warned, he will readily sacrifice his minions to save himself._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Can you save the kingdom from darkness? Do you have the courage, the cunning and the will to withstand the necromancer and his forces? Strategize, plan and bring out the best of your abilities to end our Darkest Night!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Data:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Complexity: 4.5 on a 9 scale_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Solitaire Suitability: 9 on a 9 scale_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Scale: Each unit represents a Hero, the Necromancer or blights in a guerilla war over a small kingdom. Each round represents approximately several days to a week._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2012 Charles S. Roberts Best Science-Fiction or Fantasy Board Wargame Nominee

New in shrink wrap. Canadians will be charge applicable taxes. Orders will be processed the same day and shipped by expedited parcel. You will be charged exact shipping plus $2 for packing material. Reserved for paladinelliot Please make paypal payment to commizzar@gmail.com

Victory Point Games Boxed edition with both the paper and mounted boards. The components are in very good condition. The box slipcase has a little bit of shelf wear on bottom edge. The reason this is acceptable (vice very good) is that it only includes 7 of the 16 key counters. I did not find this to be much of an issue because you normally only collect 3 keys before trading them in for a holy relic. So it is only an issue if you have 4 characters and they are all holding a couple keys each (or you can use a substitute or the publisher will sell extra counters if you contact them). Your party would have to be extremely dumb to be walking around with 16 key counters. I can ship this regular priority, flat rate priority, or standard mail, whichever you prefer. At most, shipping will be the cost of a medium flat rate priority mail box.
